org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.view.impl

Class BaseViewImpl<T extends Presenter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.Parent
        • javafx.scene.layout.Region
          • javafx.scene.layout.Pane
            • javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
              • org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.view.impl.BaseViewImpl<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, CssConstants, View<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateNewPackageViewImpl, EditPackageContentsViewImpl, HomepageViewImpl, OpenExistingPackageViewImpl, PackageGenerationViewImpl, PackageMetadataViewImpl

    public abstract class BaseViewImpl<T extends Presenter>
extends javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
implements View<T>, CssConstants
    Base view that handles controls and view elements that are the same across all views. Handles the setting up and retrieval of the header and footer controls.
